responsible: Responsible according to data protection laws, in particular the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), is:
contact: Claudia Barthel, Stephan Bienhüls, Carmen Birkle, Björn Dardemann, Dominik Schlabs, Carolin Walter
rightsInfo: Under the provided contact details of our data protection officer, you can exercise the following rights at any time:
rightAccess: Access to your stored data and their processing (Art. 15 GDPR)
rightCorrection: Correction of inaccurate personal data (Art. 16 GDPR)
rightDeletion: Deletion of your stored data (Art. 17 GDPR)
rightRestriction: Restriction of data processing if we are not yet allowed to delete your data due to legal obligations (Art. 18 GDPR)
rightObjection: Objection to the processing of your data by us (Art. 21 GDPR)
rightDataPortability: Data portability, if you have consented to data processing or have concluded a contract with us (Art. 20 GDPR)
revokeConsent: If you have given us your consent, you can revoke it at any time with effect for the future.
complaintAuthority: You can always lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority, e.g., the supervisory authority of the federal state of your residence or the authority responsible for us as the responsible body.
supervisoryAuthorityList: A list of supervisory authorities (for the non-public sector) with addresses can be found at:
cookiesInfo: Like many other websites, we also use so-called 'cookies.' Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device (laptop, tablet, smartphone, etc.) when you visit our website.
cookiesUsed: If you allow us to use cookies through your browser settings or consent, the following cookies may be used on our websites:
necessaryCookiesInfo: We use cookies to make our website more user-friendly. Some elements of our website require that the requesting browser can still be identified even after a page change.
functionalitiesRequireCookies: The purpose of using technically necessary cookies is to simplify the use of websites for users. Some functions of our website cannot be offered without the use of cookies. For these functions, it is necessary that the browser can be recognized even after a page change.
legalBasisAndInterestInfo: The processing is carried out in accordance with Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR based on our legitimate interest in a user-friendly design of our website.
recipientsInfo: Recipients of the data may be technical service providers who act as processors for the operation and maintenance of our website.
mandatoryOrRequiredInfo: The provision of the aforementioned personal data is not legally or contractually required. However, without this data, the service and functionality of our website may not be guaranteed. In addition, certain services and features may not be available or restricted.
objectionInfo: Please refer to the information below regarding your right to object pursuant to Art. 21 GDPR.
registrationInfo: For registration on our website, we require some personal data that is transmitted to us through an input mask.
additionalData: At the time of registration, the following data is also collected:
legalBasisInfo: The processing of the data entered during registration is based on the user's consent (Art. 6(1)(a) GDPR).
recipientsRegistrationInfo: Recipients of the data may be technical service providers who act as processors for the operation and maintenance of our website.
storageDurationRegistrationInfo: Data will only be processed for as long as the corresponding consent is valid.
mandatoryOrRequiredRegistrationInfo: Providing your personal data is voluntary, solely based on your consent. Without providing your personal data, we cannot grant you access to our offered content.
rightWithdrawalRegistrationInfo: You have the right to revoke your consent to the processing of your personal data at any time.
sslEncryptionInfo: To protect the security of your data during transmission, we use state-of-the-art encryption methods (e.g., SSL) via HTTPS.
objectionRightInfo: Information about your right to object pursuant to Art. 21 GDPR
objectionRightIndividualInfo: You have the right to object, on grounds relating to your particular situation, at any time to the processing of personal data concerning you which is based on Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR (processing based on legitimate interests); this also applies to profiling based on those provisions.
objectionRecipientInfo: Claudia Barthel, Stephan Bienhüls, Carmen Birkle, Björn Dardemann, Dominik Schlabs, Carolin Walter
privacyPolicyChangesInfo: We reserve the right to amend this privacy policy to ensure that it complies with current legal requirements or to implement changes to our services in the privacy policy, such as the introduction of new services. The new privacy policy will apply for your future visits.
questionsToDataProtectionOfficer: Questions to the Data Protection Officer
dataProtectionOfficerEmail: If you have any questions regarding data protection, please write us an email or contact the person responsible for data protection in our organization: birkle@carmenbirkle.de
privacyPolicyGeneratedBy: The privacy policy was created with the help of activeMind AG, the experts for external data protection officers (Version #2020-09-30).
